description: This file defines a class 'Env' that manages environment configuration for a Flutter application, providing static getters for API base URL and timeout settings, retrieving them from environment variables or default values.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A class providing static accessors for environment configuration variables such as API base URL and timeout.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables or a default URL if not set.

methods.name: apiTimeout
methods.description: Returns the API timeout value in seconds from environment variables or a default of 30 seconds.
